title: Supermicro Stock Rises on News of Product Shipments Using Nvidia Blackwell Chips
description: Super Micro Computer said it was now shipping products that use Nvidia's high-speed Blackwell semiconductor for use in artificial intelligence applications.
content:
Super Micro Computer (SMCI), or Supermicro, shares gained as the computer hardware maker announced it was delivering products with Nvidia's (NVDA) high-speed Blackwell Ultra chips for artificial intelligence computing.
The company explained that the ... [542 chars]

title: Tencent Hires OpenAI Researcher as China Steps Up Talent Search
description: Tencent Holdings Ltd. has recruited a prominent artificial intelligence researcher from OpenAI in one of the most high-profile defections from the US AI sector to China, according to people familiar with the matter.
content:
Tencent Holdings Ltd. has recruited a prominent artificial intelligence researcher from OpenAI in one of the most high-profile defections from the US AI sector to China, according to people familiar with the matter.

title: OpenAI’s Public Benefit Corporation (PBC) Plans Explained
description: After months of back-and-forth with regulators and stakeholders, OpenAI said it’s getting closer to converting into a more traditional, for-profit company – a key step in its bid to secure billions more in capital to build cutting-edge artificial intelligence products.
content: After months of back-and-forth with regulators and stakeholders, OpenAI said it’s getting closer to converting into a more traditional, for-profit company – a key step in its bid to secure billions more in capital to build cutting-edge artificial int... [329 chars]

title: Meet Diella from Albania, the world’s first AI-made minister
description: Albania has become the first country in the world to induct an artificial intelligence–powered government minister.
content: On Thursday, September 11, Rama introduced the AI minister at the Socialist Party’s assembly event in Tirana. Diell is the only non-human member of the government. “Diella is the first member not physically present but virtually created by artificial... [1192 chars]

title: Albania PM appoints AI minister to tackle corruption
description: Albania’s Prime Minister Edi Rama on Friday tapped an Artificial Intelligence-generated ‘minister’ for his cabinet to take on corruption.
content:
TIRANA, Albania — Albania’s Prime Minister Edi Rama on Friday tapped an Artificial Intelligence-generated ‘minister’ for his cabinet to take on corruption.
The new State Minister for Artificial Intelligence is called Diella, whose name means a female... [2558 chars]

title: Atom-thin crystals provide new way to power the future of computer memory
description: Picture the smartphone in your pocket, the data centers powering artificial intelligence, or the wearable health monitors that track your heartbeat. All of them rely on energy-hungry memory chips to store and process information. As demand for computing resources continues to soar, so does the need for memory devices that are smaller, faster, and far more efficient.

title: Believe in A.I.? Buy Beaten-Down Value Stocks.
description: If artificial intelligence is really revolutionary, its benefits will spread to mundane companies and spawn new fields, Vanguard’s global chief economist says.
content:
If you don’t like the neighborhood, wait 10 minutes.
That’s an old saying about New York City, but it applies these days to the bewildering financial markets, too. You may not like what you’re experiencing but everything is changing so rapidly that i... [7973 chars]

title: Not just AI: 200-year-old middle-market trap can threaten Indian IT jobs, AI founder flags hidden warning signs
description: Amid the rise of artificial intelligence, Indias IT industry faces potential job losses if it continues relying on low-cost outsourcing. Tej Pandya, founder of Groweasy.ai, warns that the sector risks repeating history, drawing parallels with the decline of Indias textile industry, which lost global dominance by failing to embrace technology, branding, and innovation.
content:

title: Albania's leader says his new Cabinet includes AI 'minister' to fight corruption
description: TIRANA (Albania), Sept 12: Albania’s leader said Friday his new cabinet will include an artificial intelligence “minister” that will be in charge of running public funding projects and fighting corruption in public tenders.   Prime Minister Edi Rama said Diella, whose name means “Sun” in Albanian, is a “member of the Cabinet who is not present physically but has been created virtually from artificial intelligence”. Rama said Diella would help ensure that “public tenders will be 100% free of corruption”. […]
content:
